data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Vizcaya, País Vasco, Spain.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Vizcaya, País Vasco, Spain
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 18,457 believers in the county of Vizcaya into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 18,457 believers in the county of Vizcaya to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 18,457 believers in the county of Vizcaya.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Bilbao
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Bilbao, País Vasco, Spain.
Father, guide the church in Vizcaya, País Vasco, Spain to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the county of Vizcaya.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.section_summary:
the county of Vizcaya, País Vasco, Spain has a population of 1,152,700.

We estimate Vizcaya has 18,457 people who might know Jesus, 872,691 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 261,552 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 62 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Vizcaya, País Vasco, Spain that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ
